name: Once Upon a Forest
description:
Once Upon a Forest is an adventure game developed by Sanctuary Woods. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Sanctuary Woods. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Once Upon a Forest is available on PC.
David Kirschner, Jerry Mills, Joseph Barbera and Paul Gertz produced the game. It was directed by Charles Grosvenor. James Horner scored the game.
